articles.content: LOS ANGELES (AP) Jimmy Butler scored 31 points, Stephen Curry added 23 and the Golden State Warriors overcame Luka Doncics 43-point performance to beat the Los Angeles Lakers 119-109 on Tuesday night… [+1916 chars]

articles.author: Dylan Moriarty
articles.title: Tropical Storm Melissa tracker: Map and projected storm path - The Washington Post
articles.description: Melissa is the 13th named storm of the hurricane season.
articles.content: Tropical Storm Melissa has formed in the Caribbean Sea and is on a path toward Jamaica and Haiti. It is expected to bring tropical storm-strength rain and winds to multiple Caribbean Islands by Thursday… [+12 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump pick to lead watchdog agency withdraws after offensive text messages revealed - NPR
articles.description: President Donald Trump 's pick to lead a federal watchdog agency withdrew from consideration Tuesday evening, after his offensive text messages were made public and GOP senators revolted.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Donald Trump 's pick to lead a federal watchdog agency withdrew from consideration Tuesday evening, after his offensive text messages were made public and GOP senators revolted. [+3514 chars]
